name: Lawrence Sia
text: I believe hindi yan 100%, I'm looking at it as a whole, not slicing it into pieces and verify it one by one. I believe as a whole it will make Philippines a better country.    Just like SG, definitely their system is not perfect, and I don't think the process they did decades ago of making it a better country is 100% rin, but it still become a better country.
